com.example.evans.data

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.evans.data.MainController

  • public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will hold most of the list data for the application and will contain methods to create, retrieve update and delete goals, sales, services, appointments, customers and expenses. This is the main data source for the user interface in the application. License: Private - Class work version: 0.0.1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainController()
      The constructor will do nothing for now.
